keyToStrMap.Full:
Barry the Banana Grower

Occupation:
[] Banana growing (previously dietician)

Likes:
[] Banana splits, sunshine, the colour yellow

Dislikes:
[] Green bananas, monkeys

Favourite quote:
[] No man is an island

Favourite people in the (living) world:
[] My children

How I came to be here:
[] Going on a 'banana only' diet

What I wish:
[] Someone would invent monkey repellent for bananas
